title: WHEREAS City of Peterborough Holdings Inc. has requested Council of the City of Peterborough to authorize: a) an indirect acquisition by Peterborough Utilities Inc. of equity interests; and b) the City’s commitment to transfer to City of Peterborough Holdings Inc. up to $20 million in consideration for preferred shares of City of Peterborough Holdings Inc. BE IT RESOLVED: 1. That Council of the City of Peterborough pass by-laws in the forms comprising Schedules A and B attached hereto to authorize: a) an indirect acquisition by Peterborough Utilities Inc. of equity interests; and b) the City’s commitment to transfer to City of Peterborough Holdings Inc. up to $20 million in consideration for preferred shares of City of Peterborough Holdings Inc.

That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report CLSOCS22-004 dated July 25, 2022 of the City Solicitor as follows: That the City proceed with the Peterborough Public Health proposal on terms acceptable to the CAO and City solicitor provided that such mortgages are approved with Ontario Infrastructure and Lands Corporation.
